ygData.subject: Re: links?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about the others but I have my fav. links on my profile page. I just need to update my pics,and I will as soon as I remember how I did it. I just
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about the others but I have my fav.
links on my profile page. I just need to update my
pics,and I will as soon as I remember how I did it. I just
tried(I tried to send a screenshot from my EQ file, and
it told me I had the wrong format). Anyone know how
to change our bitmap screenshots unto a jpeg or
something else that will work???<br> Myself and about a
half dozen other peps(including our founder!)have
tried to post pics on the "Photos" link on the left
<-<-<- there,but only three knew how to do it right.
Would someone enlighten us on how to post Screen Shots.
I and I'm sure,other fellow addicts would like to
see our brothers and sisters in action. <br> "Keep
comming back,it works" Lowlap of Prexus<br><br>P.S. I
have some awsome shots of the Goddess,TUNARE,making a
rare apperance in Greater Faydark. It was the most
spiritual moment I have had playing EQ!! I would be happy
to retell the experiance and post some pics if peps
want to hear about it.
